title: Emerald Radiance: Statement Necklace Set
materials: Base metal is an alloy. High-quality gold plated with a Hyderabadi polish. Set with Emeralds (oval cabochon cut
VS clarity) and Cubic Zirconia (CZ) for brilliant sparkle. Plating prevents easy tarnishing and requires only proper care.
features: A modern take on the traditional Haaram, this necklace features a seamless arrangement of Emerald cabochons. The Y design is eye-catching and suits modern sensibilities. Each gemstone is encrusted by a halo of CZ stones which add brilliance and definition. The matching earrings, with a vertical Emerald and CZ design, complete the look.
colors: Emerald green and brilliant white CZ stones contrast against the golden hue of the Hyderabadi polish
creating a sophisticated and vibrant color palette.
occasions: and special festive occasions. The Emerald lends itself well to evening wear and can also be used for more casual settings for added elegance.
description: This set combines the timeless elegance of Emeralds with a modern, versatile design. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine, while the Emeralds offer a vibrant and sophisticated look. The set is perfect for those who appreciate fine craftsmanship and contemporary jewelry.
